description: This file defines utility functions for handling user authentication processes, including sign-up, password reset, email link sign-in, and OAuth sign-in, using the Supabase authentication client.

methods.name: handleAuthError
methods.description: Handles authentication errors by logging and redirecting users based on error messages.

methods.name: signUp
methods.description: Registers a new user with email and password, setting a redirect URL upon email verification.

methods.name: resetPassword
methods.description: Initiates a password reset email to the user's email address with a redirect URL.

methods.name: signInWithMagicLink
methods.description: Signs in a user via a magic email link using OTP with a callback redirect URL.

methods.name: signInWithOAuth
methods.description: Signs in a user via an OAuth provider, redirecting to a callback URL.
